attributes.action: Make it law that there is a Neighbours omnibus on sundays!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We students miss neighbours some days and when we graduate we will have no chance to watch the favorite export from the great nation of Australia...

So please tony....

make it law that an omnibus must be shown on sundays!!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
